DOC.detailed_description: Biphenyl dimethyl dicarboxylate ( DDB ) combine garlic oil ( pennel ) use treat chronic liver disease . A randomized , double-blind , active- placebo-controlled clinical trial conduct investigate efficacy , safety quality life chronic liver disease patient .
